Estimate my apprenticeship funding

Use this tool to estimate if your organisation will pay the apprenticeship levy, how much your organisation will have available to spend on apprenticeships and how much the government will contribute towards the cost of training.

You’ll need to know your organisation’s annual UK payroll.

What is my payroll?

Your payroll is based on the total amount of employee earnings you use to calculate employer National Insurance contributions before any deductions.

For more detailed guidance see the employer guide to the levy.

It would also help if you know:

  • the percentage of your workforce that live in England
  • the type of apprenticeship training you will need

Start

Disclaimer This tool is designed to be illustrative only. The actual amount of levy you will pay may vary, for example, this tool may underestimate the amount of levy you will pay and therefore receive if your organisation is part of a group. The Department for Education is not responsible for the consequences of any decisions or actions taken in reliance on the information provided by this tool.
